statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, campaign_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics ORDER BY campaign_performance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(campaign_performance) AS average_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_interactions > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, campaign_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date, campaign_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE customer_id = 10 AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND campaign_performance > 0.8;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING num_interactions > 3 ORDER BY num_interactions DESC;

SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, AVG(campaign_performance) AS average_performance FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY customer_id, campaign_id ORDER BY average_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY phone_number
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_description FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_interactions > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_interactions > 1000 AND total_conversions < 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_interactions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, metric_to_optimize, optimization_value FROM campaign_metrics INNER JOIN optimization_data ON campaign_metrics.campaign_id = optimization_data.campaign_id WHERE optimization_value > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'abc123';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks), AVG(cost) FROM metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT c.campaign_name, m.impressions, m.clicks, m.conversions FROM campaigns c JOIN metrics m ON c.campaign_id = m.campaign_id WHERE m.conversions > 50;

SELECT i.interaction_id, i.customer_id, i.campaign_id, i.interaction_date, c.campaign_name FROM interactions i JOIN campaigns c ON i.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, status, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%456%';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND status <> 'archived';

SELECT c.campaign_name, cm.impressions, cm.clicks, cm.conversions FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_metrics cm ON c.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id WHERE cm.impressions > 1000 AND cm.clicks > 500 ORDER BY cm.conversions DESC;
